kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=movies, url=https://moviesdatabase.p.rapidapi.com/titles, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://moviesdatabase.p.rapidapi.com/titles/ path_url=/titles/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'X-RapidAPI-Key': '6fc4363381mshccc938c5300e831p1a2d4cjsnc09dc6d2a411', 'X-RapidAPI-Host': 'moviesdatabase.p.rapidapi.com'} body=None

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
